title: EverQuest Daily Grind
desc: A weblog about game addiction from a former gamer.  Includes stories and letters from past and present addicts.

title: GamerWidow.com
desc: A site that provides support and resources for 'gamer widow(er)s'. Message boards, chat room, articles and links to support those who are feeling neglected by their gamer (video/console/online gamers) partner.

title: Online Gamers Anonymous
desc: Twelve-step support network for gaming addicts.  Includes news, explanation of the 12-step approach, and forums.

title: Video Game Addiction: Do we need a Video Gamers Anonymous?
desc: Student research paper on games addiction by Mary Schlimme.

title: Yahoo Groups: World of Warcraft Widows
desc: This group isn't just for wives, but for anyone, husbands, girl or boyfriends, mothers, fathers, sons or daughters, or anyone that has had a relationship effected by this addictive game.

title: Yahoo! Groups : EverQuest-Widows
desc: A large, international, support group for those effected by game addiction.
